# Chrome Extension Development Guidelines

This is a Chrome Extension project using Vanilla JavaScript and Manifest V3.

## Code Style
- Use ES6+ features
- Follow Chrome Extension best practices
- Use async/await for Chrome APIs
- Proper error handling for extension APIs

## Chrome Extension Specific
- Always use Manifest V3 format
- Use service workers instead of background pages
- Use chrome.action API instead of chrome.browserAction
- Follow Chrome Extension security guidelines
